```scss
// Property: windowSoftInputMode
// Component(s): Ti.UI.NavigationWindow, Ti.UI.TabGroup, Ti.UI.Window
'.window-soft-input-mode-state-always-hidden': { windowSoftInputMode: Ti.UI.Android.SOFT_INPUT_STATE_ALWAYS_HIDDEN }
'.window-soft-input-mode-state-always-visible': { windowSoftInputMode: Ti.UI.Android.SOFT_INPUT_STATE_ALWAYS_VISIBLE }
'.window-soft-input-mode-state-hidden': { windowSoftInputMode: Ti.UI.Android.SOFT_INPUT_STATE_HIDDEN }
'.window-soft-input-mode-state-unspecified': { windowSoftInputMode: Ti.UI.Android.SOFT_INPUT_STATE_UNSPECIFIED }
'.window-soft-input-mode-state-visible': { windowSoftInputMode: Ti.UI.Android.SOFT_INPUT_STATE_VISIBLE }
'.window-soft-input-mode-adjust-pan': { windowSoftInputMode: Ti.UI.Android.SOFT_INPUT_ADJUST_PAN }
'.window-soft-input-mode-adjust-resize': { windowSoftInputMode: Ti.UI.Android.SOFT_INPUT_ADJUST_RESIZE }
'.window-soft-input-mode-adjust-unspecified': { windowSoftInputMode: Ti.UI.Android.SOFT_INPUT_ADJUST_UNSPECIFIED }
```
